ISAW-GA 3024-001 | Fall 2017

  • Schedule

November 6 / Week 8

Mapping 2

Assignment Due

  • CSV or GeoJSON file containing places of interest to you

Before Class

Download/Install/Etc.

  • Register for an account with Carto. You can create a new account (using your email or password), or you can register using your Google or GitHub account credentials. In class, we will make maps in Carto, using the data you prepared and brought to class.

For Class

Reading

  • Foote, K.E. and D.J. Huebner. 1995. “Error, Accuracy, and Precision,” in The Geographer’s Craft. Link
  • Gillies, S. 2010. “What’s an Un-GIS?” Pleiades: Documents. Link
